grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 参詣【サンケイ】visit to a temple or shrine, worship, pilgrimage
造詣【ゾウケイ】deep knowledge, attainments, scholarship
kun reading compounds: 参る【まいる】to go, to come, to call, to be defeated, to collapse, to die, to be annoyed, to be nonplussed, to be madly in love, to visit (shrine, grave)
詣でる【もうでる】to make a pilgrimage
